text:
You are the Frontend Engineer on team easyrent-complete. Your task is to BUILD the JO Schedule (Jadwal GA) day schedule board.

WORKING DIRECTORY: /home/sandriaas/_PROJECTS/easyrent/_apps/x-dashboard-0

TASK: Create apps/erp/src/components/schedules/ScheduleDayBoard.tsx
- Day-level schedule board view
- Staff shift slots and assignments
- Bookings displayed per time slot
- Drag-and-drop staff assignment (optional, nice to have)
- Data sources: bookings, booking_reservations, staff

Also create:
- apps/erp/src/routes/jo.tsx - Route page with the schedule board
- Hook into sidebar navigation under "Operations"

Reference existing components:
- apps/erp/src/components/calendar/ for patterns
- apps/erp/src/components/entity/ for data tables

Use context7 MCP to query React and TanStack documentation.
Use @easyrent/ui components.

DO NOT STOP until the JO schedule is fully functional. Work autonomously.
